channel.title: My NEW! Sig.. Really good in my opininion. H2 Themed
channel.description:
Hi, Sorry for spamming but I think this is really worth it. It took me a long time to do and im proud of it. Rate it please. ;)
[img]http://i39.photobucket.com/albums/e189/Sereitei/halo2spacecopy.gif[/img]

item.title: My NEW! Sig.. Really good in my opininion. H2 Themed
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

It’s ok, but very simple. Also, don’t worry, threads like these aren’t spamming I do have one thing to say about it though, and that is to do with the text. Simple fonts have a lot better effects than all these squddly diddly ones. Stick with simple fonts. Also, try to keep the colour of the fonts one hard colour that stands out, but goes well. For example, white text with that signature would go a lot better than a gradiant

Read full topic
